titleStmt.title: The Parliaments instructions to the Earl of Essex, Lord Generall of the army agreed on by the Lords and Commmons [sic] in Parliament assembled, September the 17. likewise the resolution of his excellencie to advance his forces from Northampton and march toward the Kings most excellent Majesty, together with his desires to both Houses of Parliament : also the resolution of the Earl of Cumberland, the Earl of New-castle and the Lord Strange to joyn their forces together in a full body and meet the Earl of Essex : with Sir Iohn Hothams determination concerning the same.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.

notesStmt.note: "The Earl of Essex his letter to the high court of Parliament. Sep. 17 [i.e 15]" : p. [6-8]
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
